code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Item from'../components/Item.jsx';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchProducts=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/products');if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to fetch products');const data=await res.json();setProducts(data);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchProducts();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center h-screen text-xl font-semibold text-gray-700",children:"\u23F3 Loading products..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center h-screen text-xl font-semibold text-red-600",children:["\u274C ",error]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-yellow-100 via-orange-100 to-yellow-200 py-10 px-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mb-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-extrabold text-gray-800 drop-shadow-sm",children:["Welcome to ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-orange-600",children:"Ecomzy"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mt-2 text-lg",children:"Shop the latest trends with great deals \uD83C\uDF89"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8",children:products.length>0?products.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Item,{id:p._id,title:p.title,price:p.price,description:p.description,category:p.category,image:p.image},p._id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center text-gray-700 text-lg col-span-full",children:"No products available \uD83D\uDE22"})})]});};export default Home;
